txt.en: Tell Alagiel that you have checked all the chickens for eggs.

'I have much too much to do. If you have experience being a farmhand I would welcome your help.\n\n'I need you to check the chickens to see if they have laid any eggs. I promised Old Grathir I would deliver him half a dozen eggs but with all my other work I don't have time to chase down my birds.'
'Thanks! Set down the eggs over there. Now if you'll excuse me I have some goats to feed.\n\n'Once I find where they've gone. Oh dear....'
The chicken gives you a dirty look as you claim her egg for yourself
A frazzled farmer needs help looking after her livestock.
The chicken has no eggs and wishes you wouldn't put so much pressure on it to lay one
The chicken is busy and has no time to entertain your search for eggs
Alagiel has asked you to check the chickens of Lothgobel for eggs.
This chicken has two eggs. The guilty look in its eye suggests that one might be stolen
